Attention! This is a Beta version of Esc: Bem-vindo ao Fika, o Mod Coop OFFLINE para SPT.
NDA free warning: Para hospedar/entrar em um jogo, você deve selecionar um mapa e ir até a última tela para usar o Navegador de Servidores.

F_UI_ToSLong:
Welcome to Fika!

Fika is a co-op mod for SPT, allowing you to play with your friends. Fika is and will always be free, if you paid for it you got scammed. You are also not allowed to host public servers with monetization or donations.

Wait for this message to fade to accept our Terms of Service.

You can join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/project-fika
F_UI_ToSShort:
Welcome to Fika!

Fika is a co-op mod for SPT, allowing you to play with your friends. Fika is and will always be free, if you paid for it you got scammed. You are also not allowed to host public servers with monetization or donations.

You can join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/project-fika
